title: Hand-cut cards with big borders and no creases
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Hand-cut cards with big borders and no creases
posts.post_content:
These are from the k1wb1 ebay sales a couple years back.

Cards are in incredible shape.  I bought them because of their funky cuts.  

Prices include shipping (within U.S)

Needham $75
Oldring $75
Camnitz $85 SOLD
Overall $85
